bibl.title: [Michigan Papyri. Volume IX.] Papyri from Karanis. Third Series.
bibl.publisher: The Press of Case Western Reserve University
bibl.seg: Husselman Elinor M., [Michigan Papyri. Volume IX.] Papyri from Karanis. Third Series. (The American Philological Association. Monographs. 29.)
[Cleveland, Ohio], Published for the American Philological Association by the Press of Case Western Reserve University, 1971, 4°, xv-152 pp. et XI pll.

C.R. par Jean Bingen, ChrEg 46 (1971) No. 92, pp. 373-377. - Bernard Boyaval, REA 75 (1973) pp. 176-185. - J. L. Calvo Martínez, Emerita 42 (1974) pp. 454-455. - Francis Gignac, CW 65 (1971) p. 102. - Dieter Hennig, Gnomon 45 (1973) pp. 725-727. - Hubert Metzger, AnzAW 26 (1973) coll. 122-123. - Peter J. Parsons, CR N.S., 24 (1974) pp. 147-148. - Juan Pegueroles, StPap 12 (1973) pp. 109-110. - John R. Rea, JEA 60 (1974) pp. 292-294. - Pieter J. Sijpesteijn, Mnemosyne 4e s., 29 (1976) pp. 96-98. - Michael P. Speidel, BASP 8 (1971) pp. 117-119. - Ladislav Varcl, LF 96 (1973) p. 179. - Hans Julius Wolff, RHD 42 (1974) pp. 125-129.
